general_advisory: Farmers are advised to harvest rice crops at 85% maturity, grow short duration Rabi crops, conduct proper field surveillance for pests and diseases, and manage micronutrient deficiency.

advisory: If BPH population is high, alter field climate and use appropriate pesticides.
Manage Brown Plant Hopper with recommended pesticides.
Grow high-yielding varieties like T 9, PU 11, PU 19, and PU 30.
Grow high-yielding varieties like K 851, PDM 11, PDM 54, OUM 115.
Use suitable groundnut varieties like Kalinga groundnut 101, Devi, Kadri-6, Kadri-7, Dharani.
Drench the root zone with recommended solution to manage wilt and rot diseases.
Drench the root zone with recommended solution to manage wilt and rot diseases.
Install blue sticky traps for thrips infestation and use recommended chemical controls.
Spray wettable sulphur to manage Red Spider Mites.
Spray wettable sulphur to manage Red Spider Mites.
Treat pond for fungal, bacterial, and parasitic diseases during winters.
Use recommended products for better agricultural benefits.
